comment: провал PErception на трубу в стене

languages.text: Из вентиляционный трубы вы слышите, как где-то в глубинах корабля капает конденсат.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Тут мы видим инструменты, которыми генокадры чинят корабля.

languages.text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.
languages.original_text: Из вентиляционный трубы вы слышите, как где-то в глубинах корабля капает конденсат.

traits.locale_text: You hear the steady dripping of condensation from the depths of the ventilation shaft.
Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.
Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.
Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

languages.text: 透过通风井，你听到船舱深处冷凝水在不断滴落。
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

traits.locale_text: 透过通风井，你听到船舱深处冷凝水在不断滴落。

languages.text: En approchant du conduit de ventilation, vous percevez l'égouttement régulier de la condensation qui se forme dans les profondeurs du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

traits.locale_text: En approchant du conduit de ventilation, vous percevez l'égouttement régulier de la condensation qui se forme dans les profondeurs du vaisseau.

languages.text: 換気口を通して、船の深部から一定の間隔で結露した水が滴り落ちる音が聞こえてくる。
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

traits.locale_text: 換気口を通して、船の深部から一定の間隔で結露した水が滴り落ちる音が聞こえてくる。

languages.text: Por el conducto de ventilación oyes el goteo constante de la condensación, proveniente de las profundidades de la nave.
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

traits.locale_text: Por el conducto de ventilación oyes el goteo constante de la condensación, proveniente de las profundidades de la nave.

languages.text: Durch den Lüftungsschacht hörst du das beständige Tropfen von Kondensation aus den Tiefen des Schiffs.
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.

traits.locale_text: Durch den Lüftungsschacht hörst du das beständige Tropfen von Kondensation aus den Tiefen des Schiffs.

languages.text: Havalandırma boşluğunda, geminin derinliklerinden gelen yoğuşma damlacıklarının sesini duyabiliyorsun.
languages.original_text: Through the ventilation shaft, you can hear the steady drip of condensation from the depths of the ship.
